tool_description: Identifies and provides resolution options for scheduling conflicts involving equipment, staff, or appointment overlaps in diagnostic imaging.

conflict_type.description: Type of scheduling conflict (equipment, staff, time, maintenance)

affected_appointments.description: Array of appointment IDs involved in the conflict

resource_id.description: ID of the conflicted resource (equipment, staff member, or room)

conflict_start_time.description: Start time of the conflict period

conflict_end_time.description: End time of the conflict period

error_messages: Invalid conflict type: Use one of [equipment, staff, time, maintenance].
Invalid time range: Conflict start time must be before end time.
Appointments not found: One or more appointment IDs do not exist in the system.
Resource not found: The specified resource_id does not exist.
No conflict detected: No actual scheduling conflict found for the given parameters.
Too many appointments: Maximum of 20 appointments can be processed at once.
usage: Provide conflict_type, affected_appointments array, resource_id, and conflict time range to receive resolution options for scheduling conflicts.

recommended_solution.description: Best recommended solution based on priorities and constraints

alternative_times.description: Array of alternative time slots for rescheduling

priority_ranking.description: Appointments ranked by priority for conflict resolution decisions
